original_title: Nature's Babies: Rearing Young in the Wild
overview: There comes a time when all wild babies feel the urge to step away from the confines of the nursery, to stretch their legs and overcome the restrictions of their environment. Whether this means simply learning to stand on one's own feet or coming to grip with new experiences, all wild babies need to progress to self-sufficient adults. Growing up is not all fun and games, babies face many dangers and must be patient and diligent in their lessons in order to attain that all important independence.
title: Nature's Babies: Rearing Young in the Wild
